about.short_intro: I’m a frontend-focused full stack developer who thrives on bringing ideas to life with clean architecture and elegant UI. I enjoy designing user-first interfaces that feel seamless and perform flawlessly across devices.
about.detailed: With a strong foundation in Angular, Ember.js, Vue.js, and React, I’ve spent over 4 years building robust and maintainable applications for enterprises and startups alike. I take pride in creating modular, reusable code and translating design concepts into efficient, scalable frontends. My experience extends to backend development using Golang and Node.js, giving me an end-to-end perspective on web application architecture. Beyond code, I’m working on a side project called 'Flink' (WIP) — a social link-sharing app that connects people more meaningfully. Outside tech, I find balance in photography, journaling, and riding my Yezdi Scrambler.

projects.title: Standard Bank Internet Banking Application
projects.description: Developed a hybrid internet banking application for small-screen devices, enhancing UI responsiveness and design. Collaborated with the design team for iterative reviews, created dynamic reusable components, and optimized load performance.
achievements: Built dynamic Angular UI components from scratch for reusability and scalability.
Led the UI redesign for mobile experiences, improving usability and engagement.
Migrated the entire application from Angular 7 to Angular 12, enhancing maintainability and performance.
Managed a 5-member development team, successfully remapping 300+ APIs into the system with zero UI regressions.
Oversaw sprint planning, code quality, and timely feature delivery.
